title: Acoustic Guitar
description: A high-quality acoustic guitar with a rich, warm tone. Perfect for beginners and professionals alike.

title: Electric Keyboard
description: A versatile electric keyboard with 61 keys, perfect for home or stage performances.

title: Drum Set
description: A complete 5-piece drum set with cymbals and drumsticks included. Ideal for drummers of all skill levels.

title: Electric Guitar
description: A sleek and stylish electric guitar with a maple neck and a rosewood fingerboard.

title: Studio Microphone
description: A professional-grade condenser microphone for recording vocals and instruments with clarity.

title: Bass Guitar
description: A 4-string bass guitar with a classic design and smooth playability.

title: Violin
description: A full-size violin with a bow and case included. Great for students and professionals.

title: DJ Mixer
description: A high-performance DJ mixer with multiple channels and customizable effects.

title: Guitar Amp
description: A portable 15-watt guitar amplifier with great sound and durability.

title: Saxophone
description: A brass alto saxophone with a rich sound and comfortable key action.
